resource.name: TIF
resource.description: This shapefile contains the Taxing Increment Financing (TIF) Zones for Williamson County, Texas. This shapefile is created and maintained by the Williamson Central Appraisal District Mapping Department. The data in this layer are represented as polygons.

resource.name: Improvement Mobile Home Only - Preliminary
resource.description: Appraisal data on mobile home accounts not tied to land.

resource.name: Certified Property Data
resource.description: Certified property data updated monthly. This dataset contains values and property characteristics.

resource.name: Certified Property Data Segment
resource.description: Certified segment  data updated monthly. This data was previously in the 'Property data export'

resource.name: Cadastral Lines
resource.description: This shapefile contains the Cadastral Lines for Williamson County, Texas. This shapefile is created and maintained by the Williamson Central Appraisal District Mapping Department. The data in this layer are represented as lines.

resource.name: MUD
resource.description: This shapefile contains the Municipal Utility District (MUD) Boundaries for Williamson County, Texas. This shapefile is created and maintained by the Williamson Central Appraisal District Mapping Department. The data in this layer are represented as polygons.

resource.name: Final Values - Preliminary
resource.description: Preliminary Final values. This dataset is updated weekly beginning April 1st.

resource.name: Imp Seg Commercial Property - Certified
resource.description: Improvement information on certified commercial properties

resource.name: Property Cama-Certified
resource.description: Certified property data including appraisal characteristics. Updated monthly

resource.name: Asmt - Certified
resource.description: Certified assessment data updated monthly. Contains certified values of the last supplement, including Market, assessed, and taxable value.

resource.name: Appeals
columns_description: this column indicates if  there has been a reschedule on an account
